metadata.description: Urogenital reflexes governing bladder emptying, reproductive arousal, and uterine responses.
metadata.notes: Qualitative mapping of pelvic autonomic circuits for registry reference.

micturition.afferent: Pelvic nerve afferents to sacral spinal cord and periaqueductal gray.
micturition.integration: Pontine micturition center coordinating parasympathetic activation and sphincter relaxation.
micturition.efferent: Pelvic parasympathetic efferents and inhibition of pudendal somatic outflow.
micturition.effector: Detrusor contraction with external sphincter relaxation allowing voiding.

sexual_arousal.stimulus: Genital sensory stimulation or limbic drive.
sexual_arousal.afferent: Pudendal and pelvic afferents to sacral spinal cord.
sexual_arousal.integration: Spinal parasympathetic networks with descending hypothalamic modulation.
sexual_arousal.efferent: Parasympathetic vasodilator pathways and somatic motor activation.
sexual_arousal.effector: Genital vasocongestion and rhythmic muscular contractions supporting copulatory activity.

uterine_sequence.stimulus: Cervical stretch or hormonal priming during labor.
uterine_sequence.afferent: Uterine and cervical afferents to thoracolumbar and sacral segments.
uterine_sequence.integration: Spinal and supraspinal centers coordinating oxytocin-mediated contractions.
uterine_sequence.efferent: Autonomic efferents and pituitary hormone release.
